overview: Take a look at our shocking world. We live in an age of violence where inhumanity is becoming commonplace. Accidental deaths are on the rise, and violent crime is on the rise. We have ended the 20th century and we have to wonder if the new millennium will end in chaos, violence and devastation. This documentary will show you horror acts of violence, terrible accidents and many other atrocities...
title: The Amazing Shocking Asia
